__e: I'm looking after your business, I'm running the house, I'm trying to keep the girls in line.
You don't want kids, or to keep house, or even to sleep with me.
I mean with the housework and all.
I am sorry that I ask you to do things around the house because I have to work.
Nor is it easy for a young wife to come into an old household.
That's how my parents Got me to do chores when I was a kid.
